title: Myro.bot
approach: Developing autonomous wall-painting robots using computer vision and precision motion control.
fullDescription: Led the development of software infrastructure for Myro, a specialized robotics service for the construction industry. The system integrates AI for surface analysis and autonomous indoor navigation to reduce human labor in dangerous environments.
outcomes: Achieved 90% reduction in painting time and zero safety incidents during pilot testing.

title: House of Aerawat
approach: High-end jewelry and art gallery experience with premium UI/UX.
fullDescription: Designed and developed a luxury e-commerce storefront specializing in high-ticket jewelry and crystals. Focused on ultra-clean aesthetics and smooth Framer Motion transitions to reflect brand prestige.
outcomes: 45% increase in average session duration due to immersive visual storytelling.

title: Rabbit Auto Care
approach: Conversion-focused car care marketplace with integrated logistics.
fullDescription: Architected a specialized platform for the automotive industry. Integrated Shiprocket for automated logistics and built a custom booking engine for mobile detailing services.
outcomes: Automated 80% of shipping label generation and reduced manual entry errors by 95%.

title: Chalet Estate
approach: Streamlined property discovery and management system for high-value real estate.
fullDescription: Developed a robust real estate platform with advanced map-based search and lead generation tools specifically for luxury properties in the Punjab region.
outcomes: Generated 200+ qualified leads in the first month post-launch.

title: Technical Chowkidar
approach: Service-oriented platform for CCTV and professional security installation management.
fullDescription: Created a professional service booking platform for security solutions. Focused on lead conversion for high-security CCTV surveillance and ongoing maintenance contracts.
outcomes: Streamlined booking process, reducing lead response time from hours to minutes.

title: Genesis Classes
approach: Scalable educational platform for competitive exam prep and student management.
fullDescription: Built a comprehensive learning management system (LMS) for Genesis Classes. Includes student portals, real-time test series, and administrative analytics dashboards.
outcomes: Supports 2,000+ concurrent students with sub-second response times during peak exam hours.
